content: duet shawl is a performance of two yarns coming together to perform on your needles combining the lamb & kid with lolabean yarn co this simple yet satisfying garter stitch elongated triangle shawl is the perfect instrument to show off these two amazing yarns the duet shawl is a rhythmic knit that is perfect to knit with friends sample shown mc clarence in color pop rocks cc otebo bean in color electric youth sizes one size finished measurements approximately 78 / 195cm wingspan x 23 / 57 5cm deep along center spine yarn requirements *please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make * the lamb & kid clarence 100% fine merino wool 185 yards per 100g 2 skeins lolabean yarn co otebo bean 100% merino wool 213 yards per 115g 2 skeins or mc approximately 370 yards / 336 meters of an aran weight yarn cc approximately 350 yards / 320 meters of an aran weight yarn suggested needles *needles listed are suggested * gauge needle us 8 5mm 32 / 80cm circular needles or longer gauge *while gauge is not crucial it will affect overall yardage used and the overall finished dimensions * 16 stitches and 26 row = 4 in garter stitch using gauge needle blocked tools stitch markers tapestry needle
